name: The Fall Of Cawold
description:
This game was developed during a 48 hour game jam, the theme was 'Don't Lose Faith' and had a focus of 'Powerups'.

You are a wizard staying in the small, quaint village of Cawold in the middle of Begorn Woods. The village is under siege by the forces of darkness and the villagers are relying on you to defend them! The more enemies you defeat, the more faith they will have in you! But be wary of damaging the village or they will lose faith in you!

Controls:

Movement/Look: WASD/Mouse

Sprint: Hold Shift

Fireball: Left Mouse Button

Fireburst: Right Mouse Button

Firewall: Mouse Scroll
